text: In your Portkey wallet, the MainChain and dAppChain typically share the same base address, but they differ by the suffix (i.e. AELF for mainchain / tDVV for dAppChain).However, if you are still using the deprecated version of Portkey Wallet, the MainChain and dAppChain addresses might be different for the same account.
title: Do MainChain and dAppChain in my Portkey wallet have different addresses?
